Dating: GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD (not before); GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD; LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Cartonnage representing a wesekh-collar
Description: Lively coloured pectoral representing a wesekh-collar in the colours red, yellow, white and green, with a falcon's head on both ends. In the middle we also find a winged scarab and several figures of divinities: Horus, Sakhmet and Maat.
